mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Harrison, Reynold
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Hampshire Co., VA [Hampshire County, West Virginia]
New Creek Station, Hampshire Co., VA [New Creek Station, Hampshire County, West Virginia]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Harrison, Reynold Patient Age: 25. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Gun shot fracture right arm incomplete. Bullet entered four inches above elbow joint at outer border of bicep muscle passing inwards. Lodging under the intigument on inner aspect of arm. Bullet cut out. Result: Discharged from service.
